description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 2D World Creator Online packs all the fun of 2D World Creator, including themed blocks sets and wiring to create circuits, and adds network play for 8 players, enhanced terrain generation and new variations to player outfits. A world of creation sits in your hands, so why not get together with a few friends and create something awesome.
description.short: 2D World Creator Online packs all the fun of 2D World Creator, including themed blocks sets and wiring to create circuits, and adds network play for 8 players, enhanced terrain generation and new variations to player outfits. A world of creation sits in your hands, so why not get together with a few friends and create something awesome.
